info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 6:49PM EDT until August 15 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ABBEVILLE AND SOUTHERN GREENWOOD COUNTIES... At 648 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 22 miles southwest of Newberry to 12 miles southeast of Greenwood to 7 miles southeast of Abbeville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Troy, Promised Land, Bradley, Kirksey, Dyson, Callison, Epworth and Ninety Six Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
